name: Bocha Simulator
description:
This is a 3D game developed using a Arduino UNO as an alternative control to throw virtual balls. 

Bocha is a "south-american bocce" whose goal is to get a ball as close as possible from the target (a white, smaller, ball called "bolim").

It can be played using keyboard. Use the arrow keys to choose a direction, hold spacebar, when the desired strength is achieved, release it!
